root: ^this example demonstrates the use of InkAction in a scenario similar to souls games
^whenever used the action shows another chunk of dialog until it eventually runs out and keeps repeating the same one
^The different chunks of dialog are seperated by the EndAction tag
^How far the dialog has progressed is persisted by the persister set in the StatePersister field

ENDED: ^this line will be shown if the action is started after the story has ended because the knot has been set as the ResetKnot on the InkAction
^it could contain something like 'I have nothing more to say to you!' or 'Goodbye!'
^if the state is persisted and EndingMode is None the action can no longer be started if the story has ended
